Title: Small but filling
Cons: Wish it came with a nifty case.
Pros:
Excellent Snap shots, fast refresh for next shot,  Large LCD panel for viewing.   Uses low cost  SD Memory card and common AA batteries,  Rechargeable or Non Rechargeable.
Easy navigation buttons, good on screen prompts.  
Great Baby Pictures.
Comments: For a sub $100 Camera this really fits the bill for anyone who wants to just Point and Shot.    With 7 meg Pixels, 2 gig memory card,   1000 Hi Rez photos,  Good blow up to 8 x 10 size. What's not to like?   This is not a 1200 dollar Nikon,  So don't try to use it at the Stock Car Races.

Title: Great camera
Cons: It only comes with a 32mb sd flash memory but it is simple to upgrade to a larger sd or sdhc flash memory.
Pros: This camera is simple to use and takes great pictures.
Comments: I would recommend this camera to anybody that wants a simple and easy to use camera that takes great pictures.

Title: Excellent camera
Cons: None
Pros: Excellent camera. Unbelievably clear zoomed in videos. Sharp focus and brilliant colors. I love the fact that it takes rechargeable AA batteries.
Comments: This camera has been dropped, been rained on and still performs like new.

Title: Great Basic Camera
Cons: A little bulky.  Would have preferred lithium-ion battery pack.  Lack of optical viewfinder.  But I'm being picky.
Pros: Very simple to use (no excessive controls).  Autofocus locks-in quickly.  Very good low-light (indoors) image quality.  Movie mode works well.  Battery life fairly descent.  Option to assign advanced menu function (i.e. Exposure lock) to physical button.  Solid feel.  It's a Canon (you can't go wrong with a Canon).  Great camera for the price range.
Comments: I bought this camera for my 6 year old daughter.  She has no problem using it (the lack of buttons/dials is a bonus in this respect) and has had a lot of fun with it.

Title: Easy To Use
Cons: The rubberized cover at the one end where the usb plugin is located. This can be a pain if you have bad fingers to get the cover off. Wish they would have thought of a better idea for this, but it doesn't affect my overall opinion of the product.
Pros: Easy and simple to use. Takes good quality pictures and should be a good buy for just about anyone.

Title: Great camera
Cons: No digital stabilization.
Pros: Great picture quality, easy to use, affordable, it's a canon
Comments: Great camera for the money. Canon for the win!!!

Title: GREAT value for the money!
Cons: kind of hard to operate with just one hand, especially due to the location of the zoom in/out buttons.  other than that, it's a very great value for your money!
Pros:
very good quality pictures for only $100.  auto mode is very efficient at what it does, and turns out quality pictures.  manual mode provides more than enough options to adjust for the average digital camera owner.  manual mode can turn out some very nice pictures!  scene mode is quite useful and works better than auto mode for each scene that i have tried.  video mode is excellent!  20fps at 640x480 with good audio recording makes it useful for actually making some home made videos!

turns on and off fast, and takes pictures rapidly.
Comments: if i had to pick a camera to always have in my pocket at my disposal, it would be this one by a long shot........a powershot! haha!

Title: best camera for my money
Cons: None
Pros: Compact and easy to use, takes great pictures. Cheap and the zoom is great.
Comments: Bought this for my grandmother and she loves it and said it is easy to use with great pictures. I have a much more expensive sony and the cheaper Canon is way better I am mad, I want one.

Title: great camera for the price
Cons: none
Pros: great pictures, compact and easy to use.
Comments: Bought this for my grandmother and she loves it I have a much more expensive sony and her canon is way better.

Title: Nice little camera
Cons: I ordered the red one but it looks more pink than red.
Pros: Nice camera.  Not too tiny in my massive, bear-like hands that seem to break every tiny electronic device I have.  Oh, and it takes good pictures, too.  I've also gotten really good battery life out of it.
